item.description:
Hi everyone,

I am very sorry for the confusion. As Conor mentioned, We had people RSVPing on meetup only and not to "rsvp@architects.org".

To make up for that, we are having another tour scheduled May 10th at 1:30. Please RSVP by Thursday May 6th to that tour to both:
- rsvp@architects.org with "EPNet 5/5" in the subject line.
- Meetup (this page).

Again, I'm sorry and hope to see you on the 10th!

visit http://www.genzymecen... prior to your visit. Come loaded with questions!

Genzyme Center has earned Platinum Certification under the U.S. Green Building Council?sÂ® LEED
(Leadership in Environmental and Energy Design) Green Building Rating System?.

Dress code: There is no dress code for touring Genzyme Center. We ask that you come dressed appropriately for visiting a professional business environment.

Logistics:
Please arrive at least five minutes prior to your scheduled tour time. Upon entering Genzyme Center, ascend the grand staircase to register with Security at the reception desk. If you need an elevator to reach the second floor, Security will assist you through the gates on the first floor. Security will have a visitor badge for each guest attending your tour.

All bags (except purses) should be checked in and left with Security prior to your tour.

At your scheduled tour time, please gather in the second floor reception area adjacent to the reception desk. Your Tour Guide will meet you here.

The duration of a Genzyme Center tour is one hour. We start and end all scheduled tours on time due to the business responsibilities of our Tour Guides.

See you all soon!
item.name: Genzyme Building Tour
